knowledge_transfers: Mocked filesystem helpers can block file creation; ensure mocks still create directories when asserting paths
Delegating test-infra issues to infra specialists accelerates resolution and reduces rework
Session cleanup artifacts (passdown, devlog, tool spec) enable smooth next-session onboarding
Discord devlog posting plus Swarm Brain upload ensures visibility even during stall recovery
Keep proof_ledger directory creation logic minimal and test-friendly; avoid redundant makedirs when mocks intercept
tools_created: TOOL_WISHLIST_PYTEST_MOCK_SANDBOX.md - design for sandboxed pytest filesystem mocking helper
lessons_learned: Complex mocking issues warrant early delegation to infra/testing specialists
Keep proof_ledger path handling deterministic and avoid double-writes when mocks wrap os.makedirs
Always pair stall-recovery actions with immediate artifacts (devlog, passdown) to show progress
Tooling gaps (mock sandbox) should be captured as actionable specs for future cycles
Coordination messages must include context, expected deliverables, and escalation path
